column4: when i do a lspci -v it shows my card fine, get a card and everything but i still cant get it to work
anyone wanna remote into my machine and help me figure out why my wlan card isnt working? lol i dont care about security atm i just wanna figure it out
your route pass is the same as your username password, it is for me anyway
well, more properly, I think gksudo just uses your user password if you don't have a root password set
